/*
 * VST2 SDK Header Placeholder
 * 
 * This is a placeholder file. The actual VST2 SDK headers are required to build
 * OwlPlug with VST2 plugin support.
 * 
 * Please obtain the VST2 SDK headers (aeffect.h and aeffectx.h) and place them
 * in this directory. See the README.md in the parent directory for instructions.
 * 
 * The VST2 SDK is proprietary software owned by Steinberg Media Technologies GmbH.
 * You must have a valid license to use it.
 */

#error "VST2 SDK headers are missing. Please see owlplug-host/external/vst2_sdk/README.md for instructions."
